title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 20
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A rectangle has a size of 8 times "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2\\sqrt { 2 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has the same center point as a circle that has a radius of 2. What is the area of incision between the rectangle and the circle? "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\pi \\quad =\\quad 3.14"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSN, Number 2
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5 dice will be thrown one by one, then the product of the 5 numbers will be counted. Which will be higher, the product probability of 180 or the product probability of 144? "}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The original question did not have choices, i added one because if there are only 2 answers, or else everyone will get it"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Private Sub CommandButton1_Click()"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dim a(6), b(6), c(6), d(6), e(6), f(6) As Double
Dim prodotto As Double
Dim conta As Double
conta = 1"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"codeBlock","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For i = 1 To 6
    For j = 1 To 6
        For y = 1 To 6
            For Z = 1 To 6
                   For h = 1 To 6
                           For k = 1 To 6

                            a(i) = i
                            b(j) = j
                            c(y) = y
                            d(Z) = Z
                            e(h) = h
                            f(k) = k

        prodotto = a(i) * b(j) * c(y) * d(Z) * e(h) * f(k)

        Cells(conta + 1, 1).Value = a(i)
        Cells(conta + 1, 2).Value = b(j)
        Cells(conta + 1, 3).Value = c(y)
        Cells(conta + 1, 4).Value = d(Z)
        Cells(conta + 1, 5).Value = e(h)
        Cells(conta + 1, 6).Value = f(k)
        Cells(conta + 1, 7).Value = prodotto
        Cells(conta + 1, 8).Value = conta

        conta = conta + 1
Next
    Next
        Next
            Next
                Next
                    Next
"}],"attrs":[{"text":"For i = 1 To 6
    For j = 1 To 6
        For y = 1 To 6
            For Z = 1 To 6
                   For h = 1 To 6
                           For k = 1 To 6

                            a(i) = i
                            b(j) = j
                            c(y) = y
                            d(Z) = Z
                            e(h) = h
                            f(k) = k

        prodotto = a(i) * b(j) * c(y) * d(Z) * e(h) * f(k)

        Cells(conta + 1, 1).Value = a(i)
        Cells(conta + 1, 2).Value = b(j)
        Cells(conta + 1, 3).Value = c(y)
        Cells(conta + 1, 4).Value = d(Z)
        Cells(conta + 1, 5).Value = e(h)
        Cells(conta + 1, 6).Value = f(k)
        Cells(conta + 1, 7).Value = prodotto
        Cells(conta + 1, 8).Value = conta

        conta = conta + 1
Next
    Next
        Next
            Next
                Next
                    Next
","language":null}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"End Sub"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2002 Math OSP, Number 1
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Suppose\n"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A=\\quad { (-1) }^{ -1 },\\quad B=\\quad { (-1) }^{ 1 },\\quad C=\\quad { 1 }^{ -1 }"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"\nWhat is the value of A + B + C?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" ( -1)^{-1},  (-1)^1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1^{-1} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are the three values in this question. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(-1)^{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can be written as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac {1}{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which is equivalent to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(-1)^1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the same as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" because powers of one don't change anything."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"C: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1^{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can be written as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac {1}{1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which is just the same as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Adding these three values together gives "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" -1 + -1 + 1 = -1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
